snippet: Political news from today's Times and around the Web, plus a look at what's happening in Washington.
abstract: Political news from today's Times and around the Web, plus a look at what's happening in Washington.
lead_paragraph: In Today's Times:President Obama's recent agency appointments and his campaign's presence at the Iowa caucuses were two tactics in an aggressive re-election strategy aimed at tying his Republican rivals to the unpopular Congress, Helene Cooper reports.
